Question: After being in a coma for nine hours, this person died at 7:22 am on April 15.
Hints: This person appeared before the Illinois Supreme Court in 175 cases, in 51 as sole counsel, of which 31 were decided in his favor.
This person was close to the Todds, and he and his family occasionally visited the Todd estate in Lexington.
This person brought leaders of the major factions of his party into his cabinet and pressured them to cooperate.
